name: Eye for an Eye (512233-JL)
description:
Play as someone who wants revenge against people who have wronged them. 

Eye for an Eye is a 2D pixel art game where you play as a vigilante who wants revenge on a group of people that wronged them, you will go through waves of enemies to get to the man you want. Punch and kick your way through to get the vengeance you deserve. 

Controls: 

A- Move Left

 D- Move Right 

Left Mouse Button- Punch 

Right Mouse Button- Kick
